Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Since I can't really trust the feedback from GenAI it did'nt really impact my learning. I would take GenAI suggestions but always rely more on the teacher's feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback sometime doesn't make sense it's just a resume of your work if you don't give it clear, detailed instructions on what it should give feedback on so the teacher feedback is way better because the teacher knows what's important for an assessment because they made the grading scale.
